reuters.title: ONEOK INC <OKE> 2ND QTR FEB 28 NET
reuters.body: Shr 1.21 dlrs vs 1.80 dlrs Net 16.9 mln vs 24.6 mln Revs 230.9 mln vs 289.6 mln 12 mths Shr 1.97 dlrs vs 2.37 dlrs Net 27.6 mln vs 32.4 mln Revs 648.6 mln vs 875.7 mln NOTE: company reports earnings qtrly and includes the previous 12 mths figures. Reuter 
